text: 52 weeks! A whole entire year! What a jolly week it was. It was crazy school spirit christmas week. Hockey! Basketball! His activity = going to his sibling’s activities. #thirdchild More hockey. I took this cookie dough latte to my mom. The elf though. Emilia dressed as Mary for nativity day. She is obsessed. Started some cookies. Wear red day! Also had all the kids school parties this day! Fave little girl. Orange cookies. Woke up and immediately dressed as Mary again. My buddy while Max got a haircut. I baked six loaves of sourdough sandwich bread this week! Oh hi, we’re at hockey again. Cutest. Her bright colors make my life. Post hockey dinner! My heart. Actual TWINS. Gingerbread house time. He takes it pretty seriously. Who decorated each house?! Perfect snow globe outside. More hockey! More baking! Christmas is my favorite. Crinkles. Blossoms. New lemon shortbread! And the best sugar cookies ever. I bought this gummy house for Emilia to do because she loves crafts. It was a piece of true garbage but we tried to save it with hot glue. Whomp whomp. Santa in a firetruck! Purse graveyard during the holidays. Annnnd now the best week of the whole year!
html:
52 weeks! A whole entire year!

What a jolly week it was.

It was crazy school spirit christmas week.

Hockey!

Basketball!

His activity = going to his sibling’s activities. #thirdchild

More hockey.

I took this cookie dough latte to my mom.

The elf though.

Emilia dressed as Mary for nativity day. She is obsessed.

Started some cookies.

Wear red day!

Also had all the kids school parties this day!

Fave little girl.

Orange cookies.

Woke up and immediately dressed as Mary again.

My buddy while Max got a haircut.

I baked six loaves of sourdough sandwich bread this week!

Oh hi, we’re at hockey again.

Cutest.

Her bright colors make my life.

Post hockey dinner!

My heart.

Actual TWINS.

Gingerbread house time.

He takes it pretty seriously.

Who decorated each house?!

Perfect snow globe outside.

More hockey!

More baking!

Christmas is my favorite.

Crinkles.

Blossoms.

New lemon shortbread!

And the best sugar cookies ever.

I bought this gummy house for Emilia to do because she loves crafts. It was a piece of true garbage but we tried to save it with hot glue.

Whomp whomp.

Santa in a firetruck!

Purse graveyard during the holidays.

Annnnd now the best week of the whole year!
